title: Teeth of the wind
creator_credit: World Wide, James Carr and Michael Hankinson
brief_description: An account of the locust problem and of the progress of modern organisation and international co-operation to combat the insect. Includes close-up shots of the locust at various stages of growth from egg to maturity.
creator_credit_for_label: World Wide, James Carr and Michael Hankinson
